TEXT: @[#FF8C00]FRUSTRATION@ NL NL You reread the situation report concerning the #ySpire #yBlight for the fifth time. Crop yields are down #r43%, #r17% of the kingdom's citizens are ill, and #r3% have died. NL NL The #pArchmage (you deserved that spot btw) has declared that no one is to get involved with the #ySpire, and refuses to give a reason why. NL NL You spend a few minutes looking out the window at the village you grew up in, then grab your backpack and head down the tower.
Enables the Arcanist extended heart kill cutscene.
A few events can be seen by other characters.
Potions that can only be obtained through events.
NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !X3! [${ModID}:SoulFireIcon] damage back.
